They live in the Santiago district of Ica, Peru. The Santiago district is known for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of cotton, corn, and asparagus. Various agricultural export businesses are located in the district, which provide many job opportunities. Like any good Peruvian, Katty enjoys the traditional food of the country. One of her favorite dishes is the delicious “Arroz con pollo con causa rellena.” When she has a little spare time she likes to watch television, especially her telenovelas. She only studied until the fifth grade but would have like to have studied the science of communications.

Through hard work and saving, Katty was able to start her business selling clothing. She works about 3 hours a day and can tend up to 10 clients a day. She also works weekends in children’s entertainment and the rental of projectors. She was inspired to have this business because she needed to earn more income in order to better care for the smallest of her children. She feels her business is going well because she is very well known by her customers  and she provides friendly and courteous service.   

Katty is very grateful to KIVA lenders since, thanks to their help, she will be able to buy more merchandise for her clothes selling business, especially women’s clothing for Mother’s Day. Thus she will be able to offer a greater variety of products and improve her income. This will enable her to continue fighting, day after day, to make her dream a reality. Her dream is to record a children’s music CD.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (women's clothing).

loans.name: Tusaidiye Plus Group

texts.en:
Kengi, aged 58, is the chairwoman of the Community Bank “Tusaidiye Plus”. The group is composed of nineteen members united in solidarity to receive loans from Kiva through the MFI, HOPE RDC, with the goal of developing their businesses. 

Kengi started her business in 1972. She sells smoked fish at the market located west of the city of Kinshasa. She has spent most of her life in different micro-businesses and she has acquired solid experience. After being involved in different micro-enterprises, today Kengi focuses her efforts and ability on selling smoked fish. 

As the fish demand is high in her community, she intends to use the next loan to increase her stock of fish and resell them with the aim of increasing her profits. Each week, her business brings in a profit of $70. 

Her ambition is to open a storage facility. Kengi is a widow and has eight children, who are aged between 23 and 40 years old.

loans.use: to increase her stock of fish and resell it at a profit.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 53 years old,  married to Joseph and blessed with six children aged 26,24,20,17, 15 and 12 years respectively. She practices farming, a business she ventured in 15 years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 30,000. 

She has requested for a loan worth KES. 100,000 to purchase fertilizer and seeds in preparation for the planting season, the anticipated profit will be ploughed back to his farming activity. 

Her dream is that she may continue with farming as well as educate her children. This is her fourth loan.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and seeds in preparation for the planting season

loans.name: Johna

texts.en: Johna is married who has 2 children. She is 37 years old and lives in Tipolo, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Johna owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 3 years and earns 4,000 each month. She requested a loan of 8,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Johna became a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. Johna hopes to expand of her business one day.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Janette

texts.en:
Janette is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Janette has a video-k shop in their community. Aside from that she also operates beauty salon that provides manicure,pedicure and hair cut . She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 6,000 to buy tools for the maintenance of the video-k shop,for the beauty salon & pay for the electricity for the services.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for the maintenance of the video-K shop

loans.name: Linah

texts.en:
Linah is thirty six years old, married lady with two children. She has a boutique business  and has been in the business for five years now and gets a monthly income of KES. 20,000. 

This will be her first loan with KADET LTD, she plans to use the entire loan to buy more clothes for sale. In future she wants to be able to support her family.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Roberto Elías

texts.es: Roberto Elías de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus preciosos hijos en zona urbana, es muy jovial y cariñoso con sus hijos, está orgulloso de su vida. Él se dedica a la venta de ropa, con gran variedad para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene faldas, pantalones, camisas, blusas entre otros, es  muy conocido en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha más clientela últimamente, pues todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es muy bueno. Roberto siempre trata de satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes; es un hombre totalmente dedicado a su trabajo siempre aprovechando oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que el que persevera alcanza sus más grandes anhelos, él quiere ver crecer su negocio y ya tiene experiencia crediticia es por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL nuevamente un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y según tendencias de nueva moda. Roberto Elías tiene certeza que de esta forma podrá brindarle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Roberto Elías, 45, lives with his life partner and their two precious children in an urban area. He is very cheerful and affectionate towards his children, and is proud of his life. 

He makes a living selling a great variety of clothes for women, men, and children. He sells skirts, pants, shirts, and blouses among other items. He is very well known in the area and has gained many customers recently, since everything he sells is of excellent quality and sold at reasonable prices. Also, his service is very good. Roberto always tries to satisfy the needs of his customers. He is a man completely dedicated to his work and always takes advantage of opportunities that present themselves to him. 

He believes that those who persist reach their greatest desires. He wants to see his business grow and already has experience receiving loans. For this reason, he decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan again so he can buy wholesale clothing according to new fashion trends. Roberto Elías is certain that this will enable him to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing

loans.name: Ester

texts.es: Ester  de sesenta años de edad vive junto a su hijo y su ahijada en casa propia. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad como frijoles, leche, pan, embutidos, entre otros, desde las 6 de la mañana abre las puertas de su negocio a los clientes que desde temprano la buscan para comprar lo necesario para preparar un desayuno o algo rápido que sirva para aquellos que no les quedo tiempo porque deben llegar a sus trabajos, últimamente se ha hecho de mas clientela, pues tiene el negocio más surtido de la zona, comercia a precios accesibles y además el servicio es único; Ester es una mujer muy activa a pesar de sus años, siempre está dispuesta a cumplir con su labor, piensa que el éxito no es la clave de la felicidad. La felicidad es la clave del éxito, Si amas lo que haces serás exitoso, es con ese pensamiento que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, productos instantáneos, pan, golosinas, embutido, bebidas, lacteos, carnes, etc. Ester tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ester, a 60 year old, lives with her son and daughter-in-law in their own house.  She has a store where she sells necessities like beans, milk, bread, lunch meats, and much more.  At six in the morning, she opens the business to her customers who are looking for her to buy ingredients for breakfast preparation or something quick to eat for those who don't have time because they need to get to work.  Lately, she has had more customers, since she has the most well-stocked shop in the area, good prices on her merchandise, and also extraordinary service.

Ester is a very active woman for her years, and she is always able to do the necessary work.  She thinks that success isn't the key to happiness.  Rather, happiness is the key to success.  If you love what you do, you will be successful, and with this thought in mind, she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that would permit her to buy beans and grains, instant meals, bread, sweets, deli meats, drinks, dairy products, meats, etc.  Ester hopes that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beans and grains, instant meals, bread, sweets, lunch meats, and drinks.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica, a 40-year-old married mother of three children, resides in Tipolo, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines where she owns farmland upon which she has been planting and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living for the past three years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000.

Jessica joined GDMPC in 2010 and is now requesting a loan of PHP 11,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to cultivate. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to cultivate.

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua used his first loan amount to buy fertilizer and seedlings for use in his farm. He was able to plant and it was very profitable. This will be his second loan amount and he plans to use it to buy fertilizer and seedlings as well as pesticides for planting during this planting season.

In the future,Joshua hopes to boost his farming business and make more income hence improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Yon

texts.en:
Yon, 33, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in garment factory for more than six years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a palm juice vendor who earns about USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s living condition, Yon is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to carry coconut and palm juice to sell. This purchase will help her to make more profit because she can carry palm juice and coconut to sell around the local community. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree.  Moreover, she plans to build a new timber house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to carry coconuts and palm juice to sell

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 35 years old, and married to Philip and blessed with two children aged 10 and six years respectively. She is in the business of selling milk, a business she started four years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 15,000. 

She has requested for KES 20,000 to buy a refrigerator for cooling her milk.  Her profit will be ploughed back to her business. Martha’s dream is to improve her family’s living standard. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator for cooling her milk.

loans.name: Hussen

texts.en:
Hussein is 42 years old, married, and has ten children. He lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is a crop farmer and has been in the agriculture sector for twenty years. 

He faces challenges of bad seasonal weather variations and high fuel and transport costs. His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent family house. His business goal is to expand to new markets and diversify his business. 

Hussien needs the loan to pay for labor and buy seeds for planting.

loans.use: to pay for labor and buy seeds for planting.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 47 years old married and has four children.

Zahra is a tailor since 2002; she makes, repairs, or alters clothing professionally as suits, coats and dresses for women. She has more than ten years experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is being well known in the surrounding areas.

She decided to apply for $1800 loan in order to purchase tailoring machine and more fabrics. She is aiming to gain more profits to improve her family’s life as a whole.

loans.use: In order to purchase a tailoring machine and more fabrics.

loans.name: Marsha

texts.en:
Marsha is 25 years of age; single mother of one child. She owns an M-pesa shop (locally known as mobile phone-based money transfer), a business she started two years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 21,000. She wants to increase float to boost her business and has requested for a loan of KES 30, 000. 

The profit from her business would help her open another M-pesa shop. Her dream is to open up more businesses in different parts of the country. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To increase her float in order to improve her business.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is married with 3 children. Marites is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines.
Marites sells  viand like afritada, humba, ginataan and Kare-kare to earn a living and has had this business for 3 years. She has requested a loan for 21,000 to  buy raw ingredients in cooking variety of dishes such as fresh meat, vegetables and seasonings. 
Marites has been a member of HSPFI for 2 years. In the future, Marites hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients in making viand like pinakbit, afritada, ginataan and kare-kare

loans.name: Exemple De Bor De Mer Group

texts.fr:
Ferdinand est le coordinateur de son groupe Exemple de Bor de Mer. Il habite dans un région d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Ferdinand  a dirigé son  commerce de restaurant  pendant 10 années. 

Ferdinand  voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans Restaurant. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres  militant  ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme  les ventes de vêtements, de charbon et les denrées alimentaires. 

Il dit que ses   défis principal est deveniez une grande commerçant. Ferdinand dit que son but principal et son rêve est possède une  grande business avec sa propre fond avec la grâce de Dieu.
texts.en:
Ferdinand is the coordinator of the group Exemple de Bor de Mer. He lives in a region of Haiti where there is little electricity and limited water. Ferdinand has operated his restaurant business for 10 years. 
He would like to use this loan to invest in his restaurant. He hopes that this loan will help him to grow his business. Other activist members need a loan for businesses such as selling clothing, charcoal and foodstuffs. 
He says that his principal challenge is to become an important businessman.  He says that his main goal and his dream is to own a large business with his own funds and the grace of God.

loans.use: To buy food for his restaurant

loans.name: María Hortencia

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 66 años, separada de su esposo que vive sola con su pequeño nieto del cual se hizo cargo. Residen en la parroquia "Río Verde" de "Santo Domingo" que es cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito, la capital del Ecuador. Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del país por lo que se ha convertido en el punto de enlace entre ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. 

María es una mujer trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura; esta actividad la aprendió desde hace 20 años y hoy en día este es el sustento para ella y su nieto. Trabaja 8 horas al día y le ayuda su nieto. El trabajo de campo es muy duro. María desea comprar fertilizantes y más insumos para mejorar su plantación de yuca y así hacerla más productiva; de esta manera obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar su estilo de vida.

Fundación Alternativa que es la institución intermediaria entre María y KIVA, ha evaluado a esta emprendedora y su riesgo de incurrir en morosidad es bajo a pesar de que este es su primer crédito. Esta institución no solamente brindará a María los recursos económicos para seguir trabajando sino que también brindará asesoría y capacitación.

Su sueño es tener una casa propia y asegurar así el bienestar de su nieto, su meta ahora es poder darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is a woman of 60. She is separated from her husband, and lives alone with her small grandson for whom she is responsible. They live in Río Verde parish, in Santo Domingo canton and city, in the new province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, which used to be a rural parish of Quito, Ecuador's capital. 

Santo Domingo is between the coast and country's highlands so it has become the link between important cities. Located on the outer flanks of the western cordillera, and on the coastal plain at an altitude lower than 1000 metres above sea level, it is the rainiest area of the country. 

María is a hard-working woman who farms. She learned this livelihood 20 years ago, and today this how she supports herself and her grandchild. She works eight hours a day and looks after her grandchild. The farm work is very hard. 

María wishes to buy fertilizers and other agricultural supplies to improve her yuca plantings, and this way make them more productive. This way she can get better income and improve her standard of living.

Fundación Alternativa, which is the intermediary institution between María and Kiva, has evaluated this entrepreneur, and her risk of defaulting is low, in spite of the fact that this is her first loan. This institution will not only provide María with the financial resources to continue working, but will also offer advice and training.

Her dream is to have her own house, and this way ensure the well-being of her grandchild. Her goal now is to be able to give him a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and other agricultural supplies for growing yuca.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: Rashid is an energetic hardworking young man living in Hioma, Uganda. He has a business of selling clothes. He faces challenges of customers who don't pay on time and seasonal weather variations that distracts him since he operates from an open place. His family goal is to build a permanent house and business goal is to expand to new markets. He intends to use the loan to buy clothes for sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sell

loans.name: Karar

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youthful client aging 30 years old, married.

Karar is a barber, in 2003 he opened his own shop, where he offers shaving and massage services. He has more than nine years experience and has a good reputation. His shop is situated in a crowded area so there are a good number of customers passing by.

He is requesting $1800 as "youth loan" to renovate his shop and to pay the annual rent. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality life.

loans.use: To renovate his shop and to pay the annual rent.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa is 57 years old and married. She lives with her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works as a driver for hire. She earns money by running a cafe in front of her house. She sells many kinds of food and beverages to people in the local community. She has run the shop for five years. 

Hoa intends to take a loan to purchase furniture and a greater variety of food and beverages to sell to her customers. She hopes that through the loan her business will bring in extra income to pay for her family expenses.

loans.use: To purchase furniture and a greater variety of food and beverages.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 5 children.  Liza has a food/retail shop (sari-sari store) that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan of PHP15,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Liza has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Liza hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods,snacks foods and beverages

loans.name: Desamparados

texts.en: Desamparados is married and has a child. She is 40 years old and lives in Tipolo, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Desamparados owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 3 years and earns 4,000 each month. She requested a loan of 7,000PHP to purchase fertilizer. In 2011, Desamparados became a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC. Desamparados hopes to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Ty

texts.en:
Ty and her family live in Ho Chi Minh City. She is 61 years old and has four children. Ty has been earning a living by operating a general store from the front of her house for the past five years. She sells a variety of goods, such as sugar, candies, basic household necessities and beverages.

Ty would like to borrow money to expand her business by purchasing more products in bulk (such as foods and beverages) to stock her general store. She hopes that this will enable her to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase more products in bulk, such as foods and beverages, to stock her general store.

loans.name: Ana Celina

texts.es: Ana Celina de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo. Se dedica al comercio de una variedad de artículos como ropa de bebe, productos de uso personal , zapatos entre otros,  Es muy conocida en el lugar pues ella siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan con producto de primera calidad y a precios realmente muy bajos, además su atención es única; Ana es una mujer muy enérgica, trabajadora y responsable, quiere aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presenten y cumplir muchos sueños que tiene a futuro, piensa que el éxito es simplemente la aplicación diaria de la disciplina, es así como se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa, perfume, cremas, zapatos,etc para usarse en invierno ya que esta por entrar la temporada de un poco de frio al país. Ana Celina tiene fe que renovando ideas podrá regalarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Celina is fifty years old and lives with her life partner and her son.  She works selling a variety of items, like baby clothes, personal care products, shoes, and others.  She is well known in her market because she always has what her customers are looking for with the best quality of products at very low prices, and also her attention to her customers is exemplary.  

Ana is an energetic woman, hard-working, and responsible, and she wants to make the most of the opportunities she is presented with and accomplish many of her dreams for the future.  She thinks that success is simply applying oneself daily to one's tasks, and so she has decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow her to buy clothing, perfume, lotions, shoes, etc. for winter use, now that they're entering the colder season in her country.  Ana Celina has faith that updating her plans can give her family the gift of a better life.

loans.use: to buy clothing, perfume, lotions, and shoes.

loans.name: Chorn

texts.en:
Chorn, 41, is married and resides with her husband and six children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling sweet cake for over six years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi). He earns about USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Chorn is requesting a loan of USD 400 to purchase a Tuk-Tuk for her husband to run a taxi service. This purchase would enable him to earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run groceries store at home and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase a Tuk-Tuk for her husband to run a taxi service

loans.name: María Alicia

texts.es: María Alicia de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, lácteos, embutidos, bebidas, pan, entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela y últimamente ha aumentado la demanda, pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es muy bueno siempre se porta amable con las personas que la visitan; María es una mujer entregada a su trabajo con grandes metas a futuro, piensa que siempre hay que seguir las convicciones más honestas y mantenerse firme para lograr el éxito, ella está totalmente firme que quiere ver crecer su negocio y para surtirlo le ha solicito a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, lácteos, embutidos, bebidas, golosinas, etc. María Alicia tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Alicia, 36, lives with her life partner and their children. She owns a store where she sells convenience store items such as rice, dairy products, sausage, drinks, and bread among other items. She has gained many customers and lately the demand has increased. All the products she sells are of high quality and she sells them at very reasonable prices. In addition, her service is great and she is friendly with all the people who visit her. 

María is a woman dedicated to her work and has high aims for the future. She believes that it is necessary to follow one's most true convictions and stand firm in order to achieve success. She is completely firm in her desire to see her business grow. In order to stock her store, she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to allow her to buy dry grains, dairy products, sausage, drinks, candy, and other products. María Alicia hopes that she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy dry grains, dairy products, sausage, drinks, and candy

loans.name: Ramon Domingo

texts.es:
Ramon es un joven muy trabajador, vive junto a su pareja y sus 3 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 2,4 y 6 años, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, así como también por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva y esparrago, asimismo se ubica la “Laguna de Huacachina”, la cual es visitada por infinidad de turistas en cualquier época del año; Como buen peruano le gusta mucho comer uno de los platillos típicos de nuestro país el cual es la riquísima “Chanfainita”; el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar “Ingeniería Civil”.

Día a Día Ramon se levanta con mucho optimismo para abrir su negocio de venta de abarrotes, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día,  también realiza trabajos eventuales como operador de motobomba de riego y así obtiene un dinerito extra para los gastos del hogar; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de calidad a un buen precio.

Ramon está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar andamios, vitrinas y mercadería para la bodega, así el podrá tener mantener con orden y limpieza su negocio y tener mayor variedad de productos, con lo cual los clientes tendrán más confianza en ir a su negocio y le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos para seguir luchando día a día para realizar su gran sueño.” Construir su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Ramon is a very hard-working young man. He lives with his partner and their three children, of ages two, four, and six. Their home is located in the city of Ica, which is known for its year-round warm weather, as well as its agriculture, especially for growing cotton, grapes, and asparagus. It is also home to the Huacachina lagoon, which is visited by countless tourists all year round. 
As a good peruvian, he enjoys eating one of our country's typical dishes, which is the delicious “chanfainita.” 
He was only able to go to school up to 11th grade, but he would have liked to study civil engineering.
Every day, Ramon gets up very optimistically to open his business, which sells groceries. He works about 12 hours a day and can serve up to 40 customers during the day. He also performs temporary work as an irrigation motor pump operator, and this way he obtains a little extra money for home expenses. He thinks his business is going well because he offers quality products at a good price.
Ramon is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have offered him, he will be able to purchase scaffolds, showcases, and merchandise for the grocery store. That way he will be able to keep his business neat and tidy and have a wider variety of products, so that his customers will have more confidence in going to his business. 
It will allow him to improve his income so that he can keep fighting day by day to make his big dream come true: to build his house with quality materials.

loans.use: to purchase scaffolds, showcases, and merchandise.

loans.name: Ana Esther

texts.es: Ana Esther de cuarenta y uno años de edad  vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia, en el además de dedicarse a las labores domésticas vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, leche, pan, huevos entre  otros a sus vecinos,  últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es único; Ana es una mujer soñadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presente, piensa que nuestros  pensamientos son los arquitectos de nuestro destino, quiere construir un buen futuro es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas, granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, bebidas, etc. Ana Esther tiene la confianza que asi podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Ana Esther is 41, and lives with her life companion and their children, in their own house. She has a store in her home, where in addition to doing the  housework, she sells basic household necessities, such as rice, beans, milk, bread, eggs and other products to her neighbors. 

Lately she has acquired a lot of customers because everything she sells is very good quality and affordably priced. In addition, the service is exceptional.

Ana is a women with big dreams and a stong desire to succeed. She wants to take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself, and believes that our thoughts are the architects of our destiny. 

She wants to build a good future, and that is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy candy, staple grains, instant products, bread, drinks, etc. Ana Esther is confident that in this way she will be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: To buy candy, staple grains, instant products, bread and drinks.

loans.name: Aracelly Del Socorro

texts.es:
Aracelly de 33 años de edad es originaria de Managua, actualmente vive en Granada, casada, de oficio comerciante, trabaja  en el negocio de abarrotes actividad a la que se dedica desde hace 8 años. Inicio trabajando con una señora que la conocía desde muy pequeña entregando comida en el mercado, el dinero que le pagaban por el trabajo lo ahorraba luego un señor que la conocía porque pasaba todos los días por ahí le dijo que le vendía el área de un tramo sin acondicionarlo el cual ella acepto porque tenía el dinero guardado asi fue como comenzó vendiendo  algunos productos básicos tales  como arroz, azúcar hoy en día tiene un poco mas surtido su negocio.
Cuenta con otros ingresos los de su esposo que trabaja en una abarrotería y aporta para los  gastos de la casa. Solicita el préstamo para comprar granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, etc. Sus metas futuras es crecer en el inventario de su negocio ya que será un aporte para el estudio y futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aracelly, 33, is originally from Managua but is now living in Granada; she’s married and a merchant by profession.  She has been working as a grocer for 8 years.  

She started working with a woman who knew her since she was little selling food in the market.  Money she earned from work she’d save and then a man who used to go by every day said he’d sell her an unimproved space there and she accepted because she had money saved.  This is how she started selling some basic staples like rice and sugar; today she has a bit more stock in her store.

She can also count on income earned by her husband who works in a grocery store and contributes to household expenses.  She’s asking for the loan to buy some basic grains like rice, beans, sugar, etc.  Her future goal is to increase inventory in her business which will be a contribution toward her children’s schooling and future.

loans.use: to buy basic grains like rice, beans, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar, está casado,  vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar materiales para la construcción de estanques para mantener los animales y además comprar la semilla para iniciar con el proyecto. El cuenta ya con 2 estanques y necesita crear más  para aumentar su productividad. El quiere tener tilapia para la venta y también llegar a vender alevines para la gente que quiera comprar para criar. El tiene como meta generar la mayor de las ganancias y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida mas optima y a su vez poder seguir proporcionándoles el estudio que es de vital importancia en estos días. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Oscar is married; he lives with his three children and his wife who are his main priorities.  He will use the loan to buy building materials to build ponds to keep the animals and will also buy the seed to start the project.  He has two ponds already and needs to create more to increase productivity.  

He wants to have tilapia to sell and also to sell baby fish to those people who want to buy it in order to raise fish.  His goal is to generate the highest profit possible and provide his family with the best possible quality of life while being able to continue providing schooling for them which today is of such vital importance.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to invest in a new tilapia project.

loans.name: Verónica Del Carmen

texts.es: Verónica del Carmen de treinta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en su humilde casa, ubicada en zona rural. Ella posee en su misma casa una carpintería, tiene mucha experiencia en fabricación de muebles que elabora junto a su esposo: mesas, sillas, bancos y cualquier otro que sus clientes deseen; ya tiene mucha clientela pues su trabajo es de primera calidad y a excelentes precios, además el servicio es inigualable siempre está satisfaciendo el gusto del cliente; Verónica es una mujer muy trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus objetivos, piensa que todo lo que la mente puede concebir y creer, la mente lo puede alcanzar, y es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar madera por mayor de laurel, conacaste y cedro.  Verónica del Carmen tiene la certeza que de esta forma podrá hacer mayor cantidad de muebles para exhibirlos y comercializarlos a fin de realizar mayores ventas y obtener mayores ganancias para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Verónica del Carmen, thirty years old, lives with her partner and her children in her humble house located in a rural area. She a carpentry shop in her house. She has a lot of experience in furniture making, which she does with her husband: tables, chairs, benches, and any other item her customers want. She already has many customers because her work is of the finest quality and at excellent prices, and the service is unequalled; she always satisfies her customers' tastes. Verónica is a very hard-working woman with a lot of desire to move forward and reach her goals. She thinks that everything the mind can conceive and create the mind can achieve, and this is how she decided to ask Integral for a loan that allows her to purchase wholesale laurel, guanacaste, and cedar wood. Verónica del Carmen is certain that in this way she will be able to make a greater quantity of furniture to exhibit and sell, with the goal of making more sales and obtaining greater profits in order to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale laurel, guanacaste, and cedar wood

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de 32 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad a lado de su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa y tres hijos dos de los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Él se dedica  a la producción y comercio de pan. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y lo más importante con clientes fijos que lo prefieren por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado, carismático e higiénico.  Para él lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que trabaja duramente ya que él es el único que posee un trabajito que genera ingresos. Su negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación y es ahí donde el produce y pone a la venta el delicioso pan dulce y francés. Últimamente ha notado un aumento en la demanda por  lo que ha decidido hacer este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos necesarios (harinas, azúcar, leche, canela, colorantes, etc.) para la fabricación del pan de tal forma que pueda aumentar su oferta hacia sus clientes. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de mejorar el servicio a los clientes y lograr así un aumento de sus ganancias. Confía en Dios que con esta decisión que ha tomado podrá obtener resultados positivos y podrá dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel, a 32 year old, lives in a house he owns with his family unit, which is made up of his wife and three children, two of whom are currently in school.  He is involved in the production and sales of bread.  He has been working at this for a long time and therefore already has a lot of experience and most importantly has loyal customers who prefer him because he is a hardworking, honorable, charismatic, and hygienic man.

For him, the most important thing is his family, and it's for them that he works hard, since he is the only one with a job that generates income.  His business is located in his home, which is where he produces and sells his delicious baguettes and buns.  Lately, he has seen an increase in demand and that's why he has asked for a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the necessary ingredients (flours, sugar, milk, cinnamon, coloring, etc.) for bread-making, so that he can increase his offerings to his customers.  

All these plans are made with the purpose of improving service to his customers and thereby managing to increase profits.  He trusts in God that the decision he has made will have good results and that he will be able to give his family a better place in life.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, cinnamon, food coloring, etc.

loans.name: Mayra Guadalupe

texts.es: Mayra Guadalupe tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto con  su compañero de vida y su hijo. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace algunos años. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener activo su negocio y es así como quiere mantenerlo ya que es uno de sus principales fuentes de ingresos. El negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación el cual ha ubicado de manera estratégica de tal forma que parezca atractivo para los clientes y se sientan motivados a solicitar sus productos. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora y responsable ya que siempre que se pone una meta trabaja muy duro para lograrla. Ha estado pensando en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio ya que últimamente ha notado un aumento en la demanda de sus productos. Todo esto la ha motivado a acercarse a  esta institución para solicitar este crédito y así poder invertir en productos de tienda como: frijoles, golosinas, arroz, macarrones, pan, leche, café, azúcar,  etc. de tal forma que pueda ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y pueda lograr un aumento en sus ganancias que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mayra Guadalupe is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and their son.
She has been working in the retail business for a few years. With much effort and dedication she has managed to keep her business active and that is how she wants to keep it, since it is one of her main sources of income.
The business is located in her home, and she has strategically situated it so that it looks attractive to customers and so that they feel motivated to seek her products. 
She is a very hard-working and responsible woman, and whenever she sets a goal for herself she works very hard to achieve it.
She has been thinking of ways to expand her business, since lately she has noticed an increase in demand for her products. All of this has motivated her to approach this institution to request this loan, so that she can invest in products for the store, such as beans, sweets, rice, noodles, bread, milk, coffee, sugar, etc. This way she will be able to offer her customers better service and achieve an increase in profits, which would allow her to improve her quality of life, as well as her family's.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sweets, rice, noodles, bread, milk, coffee, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Yeidy

texts.es: Yeidy, tiene la edad de 25 años,  está en unión libre,  vive con su hijo y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito va comprar los insumos necesarios para asistir su cafetal como los abonos, plaguicidas y demás productos necesarios. Ella cuenta con un terreno ya sembrado en producción y necesita asistirlo pues esta cosecha pasada lo dejo en condiciones regulares. Ella quiere asistirlo parar así esta próxima cosecha que sigue pueda obtener de el máximo de producción y aumentar sus ganancias para el bienestar de su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yeidy, 25, has a spouse.  She lives with her son and husband who are her greatest priority.   She will use the loan to buy the supplies needed to maintain her coffee plants like manure, weed killers and other necessary products.  

She has a field already planted and in production and she needs to service it because the last harvest left it in average condition.  She wants to assist it so that with the next harvest she gets she will be able to obtain maximum production and increase profits for her family’s wellbeing.  

This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur.  She’s had no other loans from state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee plants.

loans.name: José  Antonio

texts.es: José  Antonio de 52 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y su hija.  Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos en especial maíz y frijoles.  De esta forma brinda lo necesario a su familia.  Después de cultivar la cosecha pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos para poder suplir el resto de necesidades.  Esta es su principal fuente de ingresos. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él ya que es un hombre trabajador, responsable y honesto.  Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  de tal manera que por medio de la ayuda de esta institución pueda comprar los insumos necesarios (semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas, etc.) para seguir cultivando los granos básicos que le permiten ir sobreviviendo cada día puesto que no cuenta con otra  fuente de ingreso. Espera y confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados positivos y logrará su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
José Antonio, 52, lives in his own house with his wife and daughter.  He grows basic grains, especially corn and beans.  In this way he provides his family with what’s needed.  

After harvesting his crops he puts part of it up for sale to cover his other needs.  This is his main source of income.  Many people give him good references because he’s a hardworking, responsible, honest man.  

Every day he feels that his home’s needs are greater which is why he’s decided to ask Integral for a loan so that through help from this institution he will be able to buy the necessary supplies (seeds, manure, poisons for infestations, etc.) to continue growing basic grains that will allow him to continue to survive day to day since he has no other source of income.  He hopes and trusts in God Almighty that he will obtain positive results and will reach his dream of providing his beloved family with better economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and poisons for infestations.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz de 32 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida y dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de maíz y frijoles desde hace mucho tiempo. Es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora. Ella habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia, esto le da más fuerzas para seguir luchando por su familia. Uno de sus sueños es que su familia pueda tener mejores condiciones de vida en el futuro ya que para ella la familia lo es todo y hace lo que este a su alcance para lograrlo. Ella para la temporada de la siembra de los granos desde muy temprano con su compañero de vida preparan la tierra, siembran, hacen labores de control de plagas, cuidan lo cultivado hasta que obtienen satisfactoriamente tras meses de arduo trabajo su cosecha y parte de ella la venden, dejando un poco para los gastos de la familia; Beatriz tiene muchos clientes que demandan sus productos y ya no da abasto, es por ello que ha decidido comprar cosechas ya sacadas de granos al por mayor de Maiz y Frijoles a fin de comercializarlos. Es por ésta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en  la compra de quintales de maíz y de frijoles al por mayor, con el fin de cubrir una mayor demanda de parte de su clientes. Es una mujer muy optimista y confía que Diosito estará de su parte para lograr su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Beatriz, 32, lives in a house of hers with her spouse and two sons.  She has sold corn and beans for a long time.  She’s a hardworking, very enterprising woman.  She lives under very humble conditions with her family and this gives her strength to continue struggling for her family.  One of her dreams is that her family will be able to have better living conditions in the future because for her, family is everything and she does everything within her reach to attain it.  

For planting season she and her spouse prepare the soil very early, plant and do chores needed to control infestations; they care for the plants and after three months of hard work obtain satisfactory harvests.  They sell part of it and keep some for family use.  

Beatriz has many customers that demand her products to such an extent that she can’t keep up which is why she’s decided to purchase at wholesale bean and corn harvests that have already been picked to sell.  

Because of this she’s decided to ask Integral for a loan to buy quintals of corn and beans at wholesale to meet growing customer demand.  She is a very optimistic woman who trusts that God will be on her side so that she can reach her dream of improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy quintals of corn and corn.

loans.name: Milton

texts.es: Milton, tiene la edad de 49 años,  está casado,  vive con su hija y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende asistir su cafetal con abonos, y plaguicidas para obtener mejores resultados. El cuenta con su cafetal en condiciones regulares pero quiere asistirlo para esta próxima cosecha un mejor rendimiento en producción de café. El tiene como meta generar las ganancias para su bienestar familiar y tener cada día un mejor futuro económico estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Milton is 49 years old and married. He lives with his wife and daughter, who are his top priority.
Hi will put this loan towards fertilizers and pesticides for his coffee plantation, in order to obtain better results. He can count on his plantation under regular conditions, but he wants to assist it this coming harvest season so that it yields a more efficient coffee production. 
His goal is to generate enough profit for his family's well-being and to have a better and more financially stable future every day.
This is the first loan he receives from FUDECOSUR. He had never received other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan under easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: with his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel, tiene la edad de 20 años,  está soltero,  vive con su papá que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los para sembrar un terreno de café. El cuenta con el terreno vacio y es apto para la explotación de este, por  lo cual será que realizara la siembra. El tiene como meta que esta plantación que ara le genere ganancias para su bienestar de él y su padre  y así también aumentar la producción de café a su poder y poder ir creciendo cada día como un caficultor más. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Joel, 20, is single and lives with his father, his top priority.  He will use the loan to buy what he needs to plant a field of coffee and he has an empty lot that is what he will use for the planting.  His goal is for this harvest to generate earnings for his father and his own welfare.  This way he will increase the coffee production day by day as a good coffee producer.  It's the first loan that he will receive from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn’t had any before with government banks but FUDECOSUR offers loans with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant a field that is good for coffee

loans.name: Gloria Inés

texts.es: Gloria Inés de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, ella posee una venta de artículos varios y ropa, tiene en variedad platos, vasos, juguetes entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y va viento en popa,  últimamente ha aumentado la demanda de sus productos por su variedad buena calidad y bajos precios; Gloria quiere surtir más el negocio, las personas la prefieren pues todo lo que comercia resulta muy atractivo y útil a sus clientes; es una mujer simpática trabajadora con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante, quiere aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenten, piensa que la motivación es lo que te ayuda a empezar, el habito te mantiene firme en tu camino, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mayor cantidad y variedad de platos, vasos, juguetes, ropa y pegamento a fin de llamar la atención de sus clientes y así comercializar mayor cantidad de sus productos. Gloria tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Gloria Inés, 51 years old, lives with her life partner.  She owns a small shop of various items and clothing; she has a variety of plates, glasses, and toys, among others.  She has already spent some time with the business and it is booming; recently, the demand for her products has increased due to her variety, good quality, and low prices.  

Gloria wants to stock up her store.  The people prefer her because everything that she sells is very attractive and useful to her customers.  She is a kind and hard-working woman with much enthusiasm to get ahead in life; she wants to take advantage of all the opportunities that appear before her.  She thinks that motivation is what helps you get started and the habit that keeps you firmly on your path. 

This is how she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that would allow her to buy a larger quantity and variety of plates, glasses, toys, clothing, and paint in order to get the attention of her customers and thus market a larger quantity of her products.  Gloria has faith that this way she will be able to give her family financial stability.

loans.use: to buy plates, glasses, toys, clothing, and paint.

loans.name: Modesta Del Carmen

texts.es:
Modesta es originaria de Granada, de 58 años de edad, madre de 3 hijos todos viven independiente, de oficio comerciante en el negocio de pulpería. Actividad que  inicio hace 7 años con 100 dólares que tenia ahorrados decidió ir a comprar chiverías, golosina y otros productos necesarios para el negocio asi fue como comenzó poco a poco a introducirse en el ámbito del comercio, anteriormente era una persona asalariada pero ganaba muy poco con lo que le pagaban mantenía a sus hijos en sus estudios y alimentación debido a que quedo como madre soltera tuvo que luchar para sacar adelante a su familia fue donde decidió poner una pulpería negocio en el que recibe el apoyo del hijo mayor. Ella cuenta con otros ingresos ya que en algunas ocasiones recibe remesas que le manda un hijo que esta en el extranjero aunque no es algo fijo.
Realiza el préstamo para compra de mercadería tales como ropa y productos de verano ya que este crédito le ayudara porque podrá incrementar la demanda de productos que la clientela ha venido solicitando, como planes futuros desea lograr dejar bien establecido el negocio pues quiere dejárselo como herencia a su hijo menor, sus metas próximas es llegar a remodelar su vivienda con la ganancia que le genere su negocio.
texts.en:
Modesta is originally from Granada.  She’s 58 years old and the mother of three children who all live on their own now.  She is a grocer by profession, an activity she started 7 years ago with 100 dollars she had saved.  She decided to buy snacks, sweets and other products needed for the business and this is how she gradually made her inroads into the world of commerce.  

She used to be a salaried employee but earned very little.  She used what she’d get paid to feed and school her children because she became a single mother and had to struggle to raise her family.  This is when she decided to open a grocery store, a business her oldest son helps her with.  She also relies on other income she gets when sometimes she receives money shipments from a son who is abroad but this isn’t something she gets on a regular basis.

She’s taking out the loan to buy merchandise like clothes and summer items because this loan will help her increase demand in products customers have been requesting.  As future plans she hopes to leave the business well-established so that she can leave it to her youngest son.  Her next goal is to remodel her house with profits generated from the business.

loans.use: to buy clothes and summer items.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco esta solicitando un préstamo para la construcción de una barda  de su casa ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la compra de material que es block, cemento y varilla el realizara el trabajo ya que el Sr. Francisco trabaja como albañil independiente. el quiere darle una mejor proteccion a su esposa e hijos ademas de que su casa tenga una mejor vista.
Es por eso que acudio con nosotros.
texts.en: Francisco’s asking for a loan to build a wall at home because he does not have the money needed to buy concrete blocks, cement and rebar to do the job.  Francisco works as an independent bricklayer so he will do the work himself.  He wants to provide better protection for his wife and children plus he’d like his house to have a better appearance.  This is why he called on us.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Andrey Alonso

texts.es: Andrey Alonso, tiene la edad de 22 años,  está soltero,  vive con su abuela que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como el abono y plaguicidas para mejorar su cafetal. El cuenta con un área plantada de café y necesita asistirla para mejorar esa plantación a condiciones más favorables. El tienen como meta generar esta próxima cosecha con esta asistencia una mayor producción y así obtener más ingresos económicos para el bienestar de él y su abuela. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Andrey Alonso, who is 22 years old, is single.  He lives with his grandmother, who is hist first priority.  With the loan, Andrey Alonso plans to purchase supplies like fertilizer and pesticides, which will improve his coffee crop.  He has a plot planted with coffee and he needs the financial help to create favorable conditions and improve his crop.  A goal of his is to, with this loan, generate more production from the next harvest, which will increase his income and benefit his own as well as his grandmother's well-being.  This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has never taken out a loan from a state bank, but FUDECOSUR offered the loan with better terms and at a lower interest rate.

loans.use: with his coffee crop.

loans.name: Luz Erika

texts.es:
Luz es una joven muy emprendedora, vive junto a sus esposo el cual trabaja como profesor en un centro educativo y también junto a ella viven sus 2 pequeño hijos de 10 y 3 años, a los cuales ama muchísimo y son su razón de vivir. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los atractivos turísticos más importantes de nuestro país el cual son las líneas de Nazca, son dibujos de gran tamaño en medio de un campo extenso de tierra árida, el cual según algunos estudios era n utilizados como un tipo de calendario por la cultura Nazca, asimismo esta ciudad es conocida por la amabilidad y generosidad de sus pobladores. Como buena peruana a Luz le gusta mucho la comita típica de nuestro país por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Seco de Res”. 

Día a día Luz se levanta con mucho entusiasmo para trabajar en su negocio de venta de postres, se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, en especial los niños que son los que más compran sus productos; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene mucha paciencia con los niños y sobre todo es muy amable y prepara los postres de manera deliciosa.

Luz está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una batidora industrial y moldes para las tortas ya que actualmente no cuenta con estas herramientas; con esta mejora tendrá los materiales adecuados para la preparación de sus postres y así podrá mejorar sus ingresos, así ella seguirá luchando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una pastelería grande”.
texts.en:
Luz is a very enterprising young woman.  She lives with her husband who works as a teacher at a school.  Her two children who are 10 and 3 years old also live with her.  She loves them very much and they are her reason to live.  

Her house is located in the city of Nazca, a city noted for having one of our country’s most important tourist attractions, the Nazca Lines, which are huge drawings in the middle of an extensive field of arid land which according to some studies were used as some sort of calendar by the Nazca people.  This city is also known for the kindness and generosity of its residents.  Like all good Peruvians, Luz enjoys traditional dishes of our country very much and one of her favorite ones is the very delicious “Seco de Res.”

Day by day Luz rises with much enthusiasm for working in her business selling desserts.  She spends about 10 hours daily in her business and can tend to up to 20 customers per day, especially children who are the ones that most buy her products.  She believes that she does well in business because she has a lot of patience with the children and above all because she is very kind and prepares delicious desserts.

Luz is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to buy an industrial mixer and cake molds because she currently does not have these tools.  With this improvement she will have adequate materials to make her desserts thus improving her income so she can continue striving daily toward her great dream: “To have a large pastry shop.”

loans.use: to buy an industrial mixer and cake molds.

loans.name: José Abelardo

texts.es: José Abelardo tiene 48 años de edad y habita junto a su compañera de vida en casa de su propiedad. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda y a la crianza de ganado vacuno para comercializar con el. Es un hombre muy emprendedor y sobre todo trabajador. No deja pasar ninguna oportunidad de negocio. Lo más importante que realiza su trabajo con mucha dedicación y amor lo cual hace que las personas le tenga confianza y lo prefieran cada día más. Es muy importante mencionar que estas actividades son sus principales fuentes de ingresos por lo que trabaja muy duro para poder seguir recibiendo los frutos que hasta el momento ha recibido. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que ha estado pensando en la forma de hacer crecer sus ingresos y ha llegado a la conclusión que esta sería una buena decisión ya que los clientes tienen mucha confianza en él y cada vez son más los que solicitan sus servicios. El crédito lo solicita para invertir principalmente en la crianza de ganado es decir para comprar insumos (concentrado, desparasitantes, vitaminas, etc.) para mantenerlo en buenas condiciones de tal forma que al momento de la venta estén en las mejores condiciones y así su pago por ellos sea el mas alto. De esta forma espera mejorar sus ganancias y poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, diferentes a las que  por el momento tienen.
texts.en:
José Abelardo is 48 years old and lives with his life partner in his own house.  He works in his own store and raises cattle for sale.  He is a very entrepreneurial and extremely hardworking.  He never lets a business opportunity pass him by.  Most importantly, he does his work with dedication and love which means that people have confidence in him and prefer to do business with him.  

It's important to mention that these activities are his primary sources of income, so he works very hard to continue receiving the benefits of his work just as he has up to now.  He has decided to ask for credit from INTEGRAL since he has already been thinking about ways to grow his income and has arrived at the conclusion that this would be a good decision now that his customers have a lot of trust in him and more and more of them ask for his help.  

The loan he is asking for is to invest primarily in raising cattle, which is to say to buy feed supplies (concentrated feed, anti-parasitics, vitamins, etc.) to keep them in good condition so that at the time of sale they will be in the best condition and therefore his price for them will be highest.  In this way he hopes to increase his profits and be able to give his family a better quality of life, different from what they currently have.

loans.use: to buy animal feed, anti-parasitics, vitamins, etc.
